column4: How to monitor and download network media? Say for example: Radio
How to monitor and download network media? Say for example: Radio
for rhythmbox in synaptic search for "rhythmbox radio browser"
and don't forget to enable it in the plug-in settings of rhythmbox - it does shoutcast, icecast, etc.
Does it allow to download as well?
it allows you to record streams as they play
Well i listen to RadioParadise and SKY.fm using their links in m3u format... will it work?
rhythmbox radio browser is self-contained and only does radio - I do not believe but am not sure that you can point it at sky.fm
Is there a plugin like that for Amarok?
that specific plug-in is for rhythmbox I don't doubt that there is something similar for Amarok I just don't know what it would be.
Thanks a lot, i will be able to work it out myself then. If not atleast by seeing the code of that plugin and make one for amarok.. Thanks
you're welcome - good hunting.
Ryhthombox allows to point to any station using the url option, it allows to add url of station, thats sufficient. Using mp3/m3u/aac format anyone can find the url.. external radios can work
well good then? ;)
Hey
Is there any way to monitor network media?
ther?
Do you know how to monitor network media?
no sorry I do not
Thanks a lot for your help till now :-)
you're welcome - everyone here helps ;)
